title: Macroprudential Policy in the U.S. Economy
content: October 2, 2015 3  Period Broker- dealers  Finance companies ABS issuers  Mortgage  REITS  2006:Q3 to 2007:Q2 48 8 20 38  2014:Q2 to 2015:Q1 43 8 5 54  Note:  Data are averages.  ABS are asset-backed securities; REITS are real estate investment trusts. Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Statistical Release Z.1, “Financial Accounts of the United States.”  Table 1  Short-Term Liabilities as a Share of Total  Liabilities in the Other Nonbank Sector  Percent
